channel.title: Changing Home and Repositioning Npc's
channel.description:
[Center]Hey guys what i need now is..How to create a starter? and how to change the home and reposition npc's. Thank you for helping if you posted.[/Center]
Once again i need to know....
1.[b][size=10pt]How to make a starter? [/size][/b] 2.[b][size=10pt]How to change the home and reposition the npc's?[/size][/b]
This is my first server so sorry if I dont understand....
[b][size=10pt]PLZ DONT FLAME..SORRY IF I NEED EXTRA HELP LOL[/size][/b]
[center][b][i]EXTRA INFO[/i][/b][/center] [center][b]Base:Pwnscape v4 I think.[/b][/center] [center][b][i]Contacts[/i][/b][/center] [center]Well of course you can reach me on this thread. Msn:Supermanhampton12@hotmail.com Gmail:Supermanhampton12@gmail.com Yahoo:Pondtoad04@yahoo.com Aim:Pondtoad04@yahoo.com[/center]

item.title: Changing Home and Repositioning Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Fatal Desire:

Lol thanks for letting me know theres a guide anyway…I should have checked first.Next time i will before posting a thread.But dont stop posting ppl =)

I am glade to finally read that someone has realized there mistake. You should always Look in the tutorial section and use the search button first! Just to remind you, your not limited to just using this site. There are many sites for Runescape Private server coding you just have to find them.

So to help you with your problem I suggest you look at my tutorial and see if you can learn anything new! Changing the starting area is only 2 sets of 4 digits unless its a delta because he has it set for a +# So you end up in a slightly different spot every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Home and Repositioning Npc's
item.dc:creator: @blood5 blood5
item.description:
@blood5 wrote:

Here Stater It All Set up

f (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
            if (starter == 0) {
                addItem(995, 25000000);
                addItem(392, 1000000);
                addItem(6528, 1);
                addItem(554, 10000);
                addItem(555, 10000);
                addItem(565, 10000);
                addItem(556, 10000);
                addItem(557, 10000);
                addItem(560, 10000);
                addItem(561, 10000);
                addItem(562, 10000);
                addItem(563, 10000);
                addItem(566, 10000);
                addItem(558, 10000);
                sendMessage("U Got a starter pack ;)");
                starter = 1;
                savemoreinfo();
                savechar();
            } else if (starter == 1) {
              sendMessage("U had ur starter pack ;)");
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Home and Repositioning Npc's
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

To change the log in or home you would have to search for the cords of the log in spot.

such as you log in here

x coord: 2441 y coord: 3161

now go into i believe it would be player.java and search for the x cord and chage the x and y coord to where you want the new home to be.

looks like this.

// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 2852; // 2852; teleportToY = 3591; // 3591;

just change the x and y coords to your new home.

then go into client.java and search for the command “home” and change those coords to. and there ya go you got a new home !

now for the npcs… go into autospawn.java
search for your npcs id such as 1 (witch would be just a man) and it should look something like this

spawn = 0	2737	3468	0	0	0	0	0	1	hans

now just change the 2737 witch is x coord and and 3468 witch is y coord to where you want to place it.

hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Home and Repositioning Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

For the starter::

You have to give the character file an int such as:

starter = 0

Make it so when they login when starter = 0, make them have starter = 1, and give them items. That way when they login and have starter = 1, they wont get items.

Sorry for no codes I’m using quick reply and I don’t think it’s really necessary to have codes as it is just a simple line. Hope this helps.

Read full topic
